alert.note: Alert for Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 12:39PM CST until January 05 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Coldwater River near Sarah For the Coldwater River...including Sarah...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Coldwater River near Sarah. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Several homes in Marks are flooded. Farmland flooding is widepread. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 20.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
